InPlaceClusterNode Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»InPlaceBorderNode. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Available Elements[]Returns an array of the labels of the named elements in the cluster. Details
Element Names[]Gets or sets the names of the elements in the cluster. Details
Full Element Names[]Gets or sets an array of the full, hierarchical names of the elements in the cluster. Element names are formatted as a cluster that contains an array of strings that represent the hierarchical name. Details
Full Names Visible?Gets or sets whether LabVIEW displays the full names of elements in the cluster. Details
Output CountGets or sets the number of output terminals on the expandable Unbundle / Bundle Elements border node. Details
Output Terminals[]Returns an array of references to the output terminals on an Unbundle / Bundle Elements border node. Details
Terminal HeightResizes the expandable Unbundle / Bundle Elements border node to the height in pixels you specify. Details
